question: Missing out three Rakats of Asr Salaah
answer:
QUESTION

If i will get the last rakah of  Jamat Asr salah , what is the proceedure according to Hanfia school of thought to complete the missed 3 rakah's . Shall  i hv to recite the surah in the last two or first two rakah's  or only surah fatiha will suffice?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

If one misses out three rakats of Asr salah, one should recite sura Fatiha and sura in the first two rakats of the missed rakats. In the third rakat, recite only sura Fatiha.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
